title: Ecstasy use in the past 12 months in Europe as of 2018  , by country
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Share of population in the y axis.
The Share of population is appeared to be the highest at Country Netherlands and lowest at Country Cyprus.
Country Cyprus has 33.0 times less Share of population than Country Netherlands which is the highest.
min_summary: This bar chart has 29 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Share of population in each Country on the y axis.
Country Netherlands has the highest Share of population and Cyprus has the lowest Share of population.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Share of population in the y axis.
The Share of population is appeared to be the highest at Country Netherlands and lowest at Country Cyprus.
Country Cyprus has 33.0 times less Share of population than Country Netherlands which is the highest.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of population for 29 number of Countrys.
The Share of population is appeared to be the highest at Country Netherlands and lowest at Country Cyprus.
The second highest Share of population is appeared to be the Country Ireland.
The highest Country Netherlands has 3.2 more Share of population than the lowest Country Cyprus.
Country Netherlands is higher than any other Countrys with value 3.3, followed by Ireland, and United Kingdom. Down to Country Cyprus with the lowest value 0.1.
Similar Share of population is found in Country France, Slovakia, Croatia, Germany, and Spain.
The average Share of population in all 29 Countrys is 0.73.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 21.1.
